bug.author: indhub
bug.summary: test_loss.t fails sporadically and causes builds to fail
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/sergeykolychev/mxnet/blob/163dfe8a428e2c0322929ed36b857ba80cec1ef3/perl-package/AI-MXNet/t/test_loss.t>test_loss</denchmark-link> fails sporadically and causes builds to fail. test_loss.t was added in PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/pull/8015>#8015</denchmark-link> . Links to build failures: <denchmark-link:https://builds.apache.org/view/Incubator%20Projects/job/incubator-mxnet/job/master/481/>https://builds.apache.org/view/Incubator%20Projects/job/incubator-mxnet/job/master/481/</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://builds.apache.org/view/Incubator%20Projects/job/incubator-mxnet/job/master/483/>https://builds.apache.org/view/Incubator%20Projects/job/incubator-mxnet/job/master/483/</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://builds.apache.org/view/Incubator%20Projects/job/incubator-mxnet/job/master/490/>https://builds.apache.org/view/Incubator%20Projects/job/incubator-mxnet/job/master/490/</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Environment info</denchmark-h>
Operating System: Ubuntu MXNet version: Commit hashes: Build 481: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/commit/759f5091eb5feae68ffc5914d6cf8798dd2af6d7>759f509</denchmark-link>
Build 483: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/commit/92e5198d659ab8f69e22bbbb9c54a36e5a25a2fa>92e5198</denchmark-link>
Build 490: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/commit/ee9771580765393b194172bab169dd67ac575209>ee97715</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Error Message:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>[Perl: GPU] # Failed test at t/test_loss.t line 233. </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-code>[Perl: GPU] # Failed test at t/test_loss.t line 183 </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Run build and unit test.

comments.comment: I'll look at it tomorrow and fix.
Thanks. I think that fixed the issue. I'll close this. Will reopen if I see the issue again.
